channel.title: Folk Metal Lyric Theme?
channel.description:
Hello, I am trying to create a new folk metal song, I have a very faint idea of what I'd like it to be about. Please if you listen to folk metal, or if you'd just like to contribute, help me out.
So far I know I want it to be about a man. Thats really it, I need y'all to give this "man" a back story and a quest that he is on. Thank you so much, Dosentti

item.title: Folk Metal Lyric Theme?
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:10, topic:536977”][quote author=Docent link=topic=655794.msg4389662#msg4389662 date=1387036174]

A Korean StarCraft player with a banjo for a face?

I already got an idea and the song has been made but thanks.
[/quote]

Why are you ignoring the struggle of Ji Wook, the banjo-faced StarCraft extraordinaire?[/quote]

Nothing against whats-his-face but I already got the song down.

Read full topic

item.title: Folk Metal Lyric Theme?
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

asshole_rule:

This “man” who is also a hero and a brave warrior is trying to create a new folk metal song but he has a very faint idea of what he’d like it to be about. He then requests help from people to contribute ideas. All he has in mind so far is that it is about a man who is also a hero and a brave warrior. He needs people to give the man a back story and a quest he is on.

Please be serious.

Read full topic
